description:
Josh Charles is out (for good). And Matthew Goode is in.Josh Charles已经离开剧组，而Mathew Goode被升级为常规演员。

Following the STUNNING events of The Good Wife Season 5 Episode 15, in which Charles' Will Gardner was shot and killed in court, CBS now confirms that Goode has been promoted to series regular for the duration of Season 5.在《傲骨贤妻》第5季15集发生的让所有人下一条的剧情中，Charles扮演的Will Gardner在法庭上被枪杀，CBS电视台已经确认Goode将会被提升为该剧第五季的常规演员。

The Good Wife has been renewed for a sixth season, but Goode's status beyond this spring is unknown at this time.《傲骨贤妻》第六季已被续订，但是Goode在第六季中还能不能保住他常规演员的地位现在还不能确定。

Look for an especially emotional installment of the series on Sunday, as various characters (most notably Alicia, of course) react to Will's passing.而在周日播出的最新一集《傲骨贤妻》中，剧中的各个角色将会对Will的死做出各种反应。
